attractions.Name: Dragon's Fury
attractions.Description: A high-speed roller coaster with multiple loops and sharp turns.

attractions.Name: Thunderbolt
attractions.Description: Experience electrifying drops and speeds on this thrilling roller coaster.

attractions.Name: Vortex
attractions.Description: A dizzying roller coaster that spins and twirls through the air.

attractions.Name: Cyclone
attractions.Description: A fast-paced coaster with dramatic drops and sharp twists.

attractions.Name: Phantom's Revenge
attractions.Description: A spooky themed roller coaster with surprise drops and eerie effects.

attractions.Name: Hurricane
attractions.Description: A powerful coaster that simulates the rush of a hurricane.

attractions.Name: Inferno
attractions.Description: A fiery roller coaster ride through blazing tracks and intense heat.

attractions.Name: Sky Diver
attractions.Description: Experience free fall from great heights on this thrilling ride.

attractions.Name: Tornado Twister
attractions.Description: Spin around at high speeds in this intense thrill ride.

attractions.Name: Gravity Drop
attractions.Description: Experience a heart-pounding drop from an extreme height.

attractions.Name: Extreme Spinner
attractions.Description: A high-speed spinning ride that will leave you dizzy.

attractions.Name: Wild Swing
attractions.Description: Swing back and forth at exhilarating heights and speeds.

attractions.Name: Rocket Blast
attractions.Description: Get launched into the sky with this powerful thrill ride.

attractions.Name: Mega Drop
attractions.Description: Experience an extreme vertical drop in this thrilling ride.

attractions.Name: Flying Elephants
attractions.Description: Kids can soar through the air on their very own flying elephants.

attractions.Name: Mini Coaster
attractions.Description: A gentle roller coaster designed for young children.

attractions.Name: Magic Carousel
attractions.Description: A whimsical carousel ride with beautifully crafted horses.

attractions.Name: Bumper Cars
attractions.Description: Kids can drive their own bumper cars and bump into friends.

attractions.Name: Tiny Trains
attractions.Description: A gentle train ride through a scenic mini landscape.

attractions.Name: Mini Ferris Wheel
attractions.Description: A small ferris wheel designed for kids to enjoy the view.

attractions.Name: Fantasy Boats
attractions.Description: A gentle boat ride through a magical, fantasy-themed waterway.

attractions.Name: Haunted Mansion
attractions.Description: A spooky yet family-friendly haunted house experience.

attractions.Name: Pirate Adventure
attractions.Description: Join the crew on a thrilling pirate ship ride across the seas.

attractions.Name: Safari Expedition
attractions.Description: Go on a wild safari ride and see animatronic animals up close.

attractions.Name: Space Journey
attractions.Description: Blast off into space and explore the galaxy on this family ride.

attractions.Name: Jungle Cruise
attractions.Description: Embark on a boat ride through the dense jungle with surprises around every corner.

attractions.Name: Mystic River
attractions.Description: A serene boat ride through a mystic-themed waterway with light effects.

attractions.Name: Flying Dragons
attractions.Description: Fly high on dragon-themed swings that are fun for the whole family.

attractions.Name: Time Travel Adventure
attractions.Description: Travel through different eras in history on this exciting family ride.
